channel.title: mangoes on ht.xyz
channel.description: Recent content in mangoes on ht.xyz

item.title: Mangoes in cardboard boxes
item.description: like alcohol in the stone pits hailed, wanted, but lonely. In limbo, unhinged from reality thinking about the skies, while baffled by morality. I scoured the universe, in search of salvation while my god’s abode was in my soul’s foundation. like mangoes in cardboard boxes sweet, free from paradoxes In heaven, hinged to reality thinking about the world unbothered by mortality.
